## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a4c4b37a0d225964d4bc4e2c4047d3b2625aac7653c21c4da48ac827c2ddac4e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'lightsequ' @ 99.7 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
